post.body: I nominate @MariSmith for a Shorty Award in #socialmedia 'cuz she's fun, friendly and provides heaps of useful Facebook tips!
being on Jenns show was a lot of fun - of course! http://www.blogtalkradio.com/JennGivler
we waited for a little while to see if you would reconnect - please share your thoughts in the Yahoo group
glad you found me! are you a Madison native?
you are welcome - I hope others will also enjoy the interview http://tinyurl.com/6a8fyn
for sure - its all in the follow-up
what a moment!
don't forget the cowboy hat!
yes all of those
whoohoo gratz on the step outside the comfort zone!
lol read my lips no more kids!
be careful out there!
looking forward to guesting on @jenngivlers show in 40 mins http://www.Blogtalkradio.com/JennGivler/
Retweeting @MariSmith: Twitter Tip: Go to http://twellow.com, claim/check your profile, add categories + extended bio + all ur social Links!
30 mins till my BTR show with @judithstephens - how to have a prosperous 2009 http://is.gd/fUM
Retweeting @coach_gold: Please check this link for a gift for the writer in your life: http://www.writerseye.com/10fun
Retweeting @jenngivler: I'm talkin' to Brooke Thomas today on BTR - we're talking about the dreaded 'M' word: http://bit.ly/nKBN . 11 EST
do you tip the trash collectors and the mail carrier? if so how much?
Retweeting @MariSmith: oday's the day @LeesaBarnes asks the GALS all about Social Media with Curves! 5pm PT http://snipurl.com/smcurves
kids on the first snow day of the school year - how many more?
